tool.name: Get TCGA Clinical data
tool.description: Download Clinical data for a cancer type from TCGA
tool.help:
**What it does:**
getClinic is a function to download latest version of clinic data for all samples of certain cancer types from TCGA website
**Input:**
disease A character specifies the disease to download in TCGA such as BLCA,LUAD,LUSC,BRCA etc
**Output:**
Download all clinic information for the specified disease in the form of Rdata.
